3300.name: A Scraggly Trail
3300.description:
This trail slopes up and away from the main road to the west. At points
the trail seems to fade into obscurity against the grey stone and near-
grey mountain grass prevalent here. The trail leads generally eastward
and up higher into the rocky ground. There is a sign here, seemingly
out-of-place in this rough country. Snow clings to shadowed crevices.
The path is steep and treacherous.

east.description: A steep trail ascends to A Scraggly Trail

west.description: The cobblestones lead to The Plains

3301.name: A Scraggly Trail
3301.description:
What could barely be called a trail leads west back down the
mountainside, and down into a very small valley where a small house sits
in the middle of a well-groomed yard. The door to the house is open and
inviting, welcoming you for a visit. Snow clings to shadowed crevices.
Bare rock dominates the landscape.

west.description: A steep trail ascends to A Scraggly Trail

down.description: A steep trail ascends to A Groomed Path

3302.name: A Groomed Path
3302.description:
This is the western end of a very, very small valley, just about room
enough for the one house standing to the east. Visible is from here that
the door to the cozy cottage is open and inviting, but the interior
seems very dark. A path bordered by shrubberies leads up to the
structure, and ends where you are standing; right by the easiest path
back up into the mountains. Bare rock dominates the landscape. The wind
howls around exposed peaks.

east.description: An open path leads to Outside A House

up.description: A steep trail ascends to A Scraggly Trail

3303.name: Outside A House
3303.description:
The path you are on leads from the front door of the cottage to your
east, to the edge of the small valley to the west. The building seems
quiet...almost too quiet. A small voice in the back of your head, the
same voice that has saved your life on countless occasions, seems to be
telling you that something is very, very wrong here. Tall grass sways in
a gentle breeze. The ground is soft underfoot.

east.description: It is a normal front door to a house.

west.description: A steep trail ascends to A Groomed Path

3304.name: The Smithery
3304.description:
Devastation greets your eyes. The forge has been blasted apart, along
with most of the back door. Hammers, tongs, and anvils lie about in one
gigantic mess, and the smith's bed smoulders yet. This place has been
utterly wrecked and blasted apart, by more than one man you would think
from all the tracks in the dust... Dust motes drift in the stale air.
The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

east.description: It is a normal hole torn in the wall leading outside into a garden.

west.description: It is a normal front door.

3305.name: A Small Garden
3305.description:
This garden was probably once kept orderly and weedless. Unfortunately,
it seems someone has been careless with a fireball. There is nothing
here now but blast-marks and ashes, and the remains of a trail leading
to the east edge of this tiny valley. Tall grass sways in a gentle
breeze. The air is fresh and clean.

east.description: A steep trail ascends to Mountain Ridge

west.description: A passage leads to The Smithery

3306.name: Mountain Ridge
3306.description:
This area is a ridge in the mountains, just east of a very small valley.
You spot a tiny cottage sitting in the center of the valley, and the
ridge continues south. Looking at the sheer drops to the north and west,
you consider not taking those directions. The wind howls around exposed
peaks. The air is thin and cold at this altitude.

south.description: A steep trail ascends to The Mountain Ridge

west.description: An open path leads to A Small Garden

3307.name: The Mountain Ridge
3307.description:
The mountain range continues north from here, and widens out into a
small plateau just to the south. Going east and west from here would be
a bad idea, considering the steepness of the drop. From this height, you
have a fairly good panoramic view to the south, including what appears
to be a small mountain village to the south and west, and a tall,
ominous peak westwards from here. Snow clings to shadowed crevices. Bare
rock dominates the landscape.

north.description: A steep trail ascends to Mountain Ridge

south.description: A steep trail ascends to The Diverging Paths

3308.name: The Diverging Paths
3308.description:
This area is a small plateau in the mountains, just south of a ridge
that leads northwards through the rocky area. To the east, south, and
west are gentle slopes leading down into different areas of the
mountains. A giant, dark peak looks down over you to the west, looking
quite spooky indeed! Bare rock dominates the landscape. The path is
steep and treacherous.

north.description: A steep trail ascends to The Mountain Ridge

east.description: A steep trail ascends to A Rocky Slope

south.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Steep Slope

west.description: A steep trail ascends to A Rocky Slope

3309.name: A Steep Slope
3309.description:
This slopes leads down and to the west from here. Up above, you see a
plateau at the southern end of a long mountain ridge. Surpisingly, there
seems to be signs of traffic in this area, leading into the large
depression here. The going looks somewhat dangerous, and you decide to
exercise a little caution. The wind carries the scent of wild herbs.
Sheep trails wind between the hillocks.

north.description: A steep trail ascends to The Diverging Paths

west.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Small Plateau

up.description: A steep trail ascends to The Diverging Paths

3310.name: A Small Plateau
3310.description:
The area opens upon another mini-plateau, bordered by a sheer wall of
rock to the north. You can climb up the slope to the east, or continue
along the flat area to the west. Another slope leads downwards to the
south, looking unsafe but climbable. The view stretches for miles in
every direction. Rocks jut from the grassy slopes.

east.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Steep Slope

south.description: A steep trail ascends to A Rocky Slope

west.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Small Plateau

3311.name: A Small Plateau
3311.description:
This plateau ends here, with a steep drop-off to the south, and a solid
wall of rock to the north. Eastwards the plateau continues, and you
think you can climb up the steep rocky slope just west of here. The area
is afforded a good view of the lower regions of this depression, and you
think you spot what might be a cave south and down from here... Rocks
jut from the grassy slopes. The terrain rolls and dips around.

east.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Small Plateau

west.description: A steep trail ascends to A Rocky Slope

3312.name: A Rocky Slope
3312.description:
This slope is fairly treacherous, but looks to be somewhat safer to the
north. East the slope leads down to a small plateau that also looks
considerably safer than your other choices. The shale under your feet
slips badly, and you are almost thrown off balance; this is no place to
be without mountaineering equipment. Snow clings to shadowed crevices.
Bare rock dominates the landscape.

north.description: A rocky path climbs toward The Overlook

east.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Small Plateau

3313.name: The Overlook
3313.description:
This area is a point outcropping with a beautiful view of the mountains
to the north. Far below, you see what appears to be a foot- path climb
up to the central mountain, a peak that looks dark and disturbing. You
get very bad vibes from that mountain for some reason, and it doesn't
seem like a very good idea to try to find a way to get there. The only
safe way to leave this overlook is to the south. Rocks jut from the
grassy slopes. The view stretches for miles in every direction.

south.description: A steep trail ascends to A Rocky Slope

3314.name: A Rocky Slope
3314.description:
You slip and slide your way across the steep ground, trying desperately
to keep your balance. You can climb up to a small plateau to the north
from here, or carefully head down to the floor of the depression to the
west. You're not sure which is safer... Bare rock dominates the
landscape. The air is thin and cold at this altitude.

north.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Small Plateau

west.description: A rocky path climbs toward The Depression Floor

3315.name: The Depression Floor
3315.description:
A small path leads south here, away from the rocky slope leading up to
the east. A small spring burbles here, evidently the cause of much of
the traffic. Looking up, you see sheer rock walls surrounding much of
the depression, making an effective fortress of this place. Sheep trails
wind between the hillocks. Rocks jut from the grassy slopes.

east.description: A steep trail ascends to A Rocky Slope

south.description: A rocky path climbs toward The Depression Floor

3316.name: The Depression Floor
3316.description:
The small path you are standing on leads north, and east into what
appears to be a large cave hollowed out of the mountainside. The whole
place seems quiet, too quiet in fact. Your little adventurer's intuition
is busily warning you of traps. The wind carries the scent of wild
herbs. Sheep trails wind between the hillocks.

north.description: A rocky path climbs toward The Depression Floor

east.description: A passage leads to A Cave Entrance

3317.name: A Cave Entrance
3317.description:
A cave leads into the heart of the mountainside, well- lit by sconces
upon the walls. A large rock sits by the side here, near a small
firepit. Debris litters the area; rabbit bones, half of a broken
whetstone, and random litter. The ground is devoid of grass, and well
trodden by many pairs of boots. Strange that someone should live so deep
in the mountains... Shadows gather in the corners. Dust motes drift in
the stale air.

east.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

west.description: A rocky path climbs toward The Depression Floor

3318.name: A Cave Passageway
3318.description:
The area is near the entrance of the cave. The outside light streams in
from the west, accompanied by a slight breeze, making the flames in the
sconces flutter a bit and throw stange shadows upon the walls. This
passageway heads north and south from here, each way seeming dark and
stuffy compared to outdoors. From the tracks in the floor, you guess
that the north is the more used. The ceiling hangs low overhead. Shadows
gather in the corners.

north.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

south.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

west.description: A passage leads to A Cave Entrance

3319.name: A Cave Passageway
3319.description:
The passage turns here, one end leading south, towards the cave's
entrance, and east -- that much deeper into the mountain. The light
sconces keep the area bright enough to see, but not nearly bright enough
for you to be quite comfortable in this strange place. From far off you
hear the echoes of what sound to be voices. Shadows gather in the
corners. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

east.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

south.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

3320.name: A Cave Passageway
3320.description:
This twisty passage leads east and west from here. Eastwards you hear
the unmistakable sounds of low voices. The echoes seem to be playing
funny effects on you, however, and you are not sure from how far off
these voices might be coming. The ceiling hangs low overhead. The air is
still and musty.

east.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

west.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

3321.name: A Cave Passageway
3321.description:
The passage you are standing in turns west and south from here. One of
the sconces here is out, making this area extremely dark and hard to see
in. You do see lights from the south, however, seemingly brighter than
the sconces you've seen along the walls so far. Dust motes drift in the
stale air. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

south.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

west.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

3322.name: A Cave Passageway
3322.description:
This is a T-intersection in the cave passageway, the north leading back
towards the cave's entrance (you think!), the west leading towards a
well-lighted area. Eastwards the passageway continues into the shadowy
recesses of the mountain uninvitingly. The echoes of voices are
confusing you a bit, and you are not sure whether you should try to
remain quiet or not. Shadows gather in the corners. The air is still and
musty.

north.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

east.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

west.description: A passage leads to A Cave

3323.name: A Cave
3323.description:
Many sconces line the walls here, casting light on some weapon racks and
chests of armor. Everything is neat, orderly, and actually well-dusted.
Someone cares for these items...frequently it seems. Shadows gather in
the corners. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

east.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

3324.name: A Cave Passageway
3324.description:
The passageway you are in leads south and west from here. Many large
stones and rocks are on the floor of the cave, making walking difficult
in the dim light from the sconces on the walls. You hear the continued
echo of voices, seemingly fainter now. Must be the strange acoustics of
this place... The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. The air is
still and musty.

south.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

west.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

3325.name: A Cave Passageway
3325.description:
The cave twists around like a coiled snake, leading east and north from
here. You begin to wonder if your orientations are still correct. That
worries you for some reason. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the
touch. Shadows gather in the corners.

north.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

east.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

3326.name: A Cave Passageway
3326.description:
You can head north and west through the cave passageways here, both ways
dimly lit by the ever-present sconces on the walls. The echoes you heard
earlier seem to be getting louder, and seem to be coming from the
northern passage. You feeled a bit chilled from the cooled cave air and
shiver a bit in the faint whisper of a breeze. This place is a little
too eerie and dark to be comfortable in. The walls are rough-hewn and
cold to the touch. Shadows gather in the corners.

north.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

west.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

3327.name: A Cave Passageway
3327.description:
The echoes are growing louder, and seem to be coming from the northern
end of this corridor. Southwards you see the tunnel continue right
before yet another bend in the passagway. You spot a small piece of red
cloth torn against a sharp rock jutting out from the passage's side. It
looks like silk, very nice in fact. The air is still and musty. The
ceiling hangs low overhead.

north.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

south.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

3328.name: A Cave Passageway
3328.description:
The main passageway leads south from here, and a smaller cave tunnel
leads away to the west. Two large boulders sit against the wall, wiped
clean of dirt and grime. A paper food wrapper has been trodden under
several pairs of feet here; at best guess, you'd say this would probably
be a guard post. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. The
ceiling hangs low overhead.

south.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

west.description: A passage leads to The End Of The Passageway

3329.name: The End Of The Passageway
3329.description:
The cave passageway ends abruptly here to the north in a large wooden
door set into the stone walls. The craftsmanship is superb! You can also
head back to the main passage to the west, where there seems to be more
light than here. An echo from down the passage makes you wonder for a
moment if you are being followed, but you see nothing there... Dust
motes drift in the stale air. The air is still and musty.

north.description: It is a sturdy wooden door.

east.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

3330.name: A Cavern
3330.description:
This natural cavern has been turned into a combination office/storeroom.
A small brook rushes through the south wall, and flows back into the
west wall through a tiny hole. Boxes and crates are stacked against the
walls, and a beat up oaken desk stands near the door stacked with papers
written upon by an unsteady hand. Some large lanterns keep the place
very well lighted. Shadows gather in the corners. The air is still and
musty.

south.description: It is a sturdy wooden door.

3331.name: A Cave Passageway
3331.description:
The area opens south of the main entrance to this cave. The passage you
are in continues south, very badly lit along its length by the sconces
lining the walls every fifteen feet or so. From somewhere deep in the
recesses of the cave, you hear a faint, rhythmic thumping sound
distorted by the passage's strange acoustics. The ceiling hangs low
overhead. The air is still and musty.

north.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

south.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

3332.name: A Cave Passageway
3332.description:
The area opens at the southern bend of this passage, able to head east
and north from here. The rock around echoes the sound of far-off
pounding to you, making the place seem somehow alive, with a heartbeat.
This place is fairly eerie, now that you come to think of it. The air is
still and musty. Shadows gather in the corners.

north.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

east.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

3333.name: A Cave Passageway
3333.description:
The passageway makes a U-turn here, heading north and westwards to the
other side of the 'U'. The air seems humid and hard to breathe. Some
algae grows near the floor in the slick spots, giving a definite subtle
smell of rot to the air. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.
Shadows gather in the corners.

north.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

west.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

3334.name: A Cave Passageway
3334.description:
The tunnel twists to the south and east from here, its dark length
seemingly dismal and lifeless. A faint thumping sound reverberates from
the walls, making you perk your ears for the direction of the noise.
Shadows gather in the corners. The air is still and musty.

east.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

south.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

3335.name: A Cave Passageway
3335.description:
This area darker than the rest of the passageway, due to the fact that
the sconces along the walls stop abruptly here. The way to the south is
completely dark, in direct contrast to the tunnels to the west. You peer
hard to the south, but can make out nothing in the impenetrable
darkness. And still that distant thumping impinges on your
consciousness... Shadows gather in the corners. Dust motes drift in the
stale air.

south.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

west.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

3336.name: A Cave Passageway
3336.description:
This is a north-south tunnel carved naturally through the stone of the
mountain. To the north the tunnel is lighted by sconces along the wall,
banishing the deep, deep darkness you now stand in. To the south Visible
is nothing. A deep thumping noise seems to be getting louder and louder
as you stand here, coming from somewhere deep inside. Shadows gather in
the corners. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

north.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

south.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

3337.name: A Cave Passageway
3337.description:
The passageway switches directions again in the dark gloom of the
mountain, heading to the north and east from here. As you round the
corner, a trick of the acoustics make the deep thrumming and pounding
you've been hearing sound as if its coming from two feet away! Very
unsettling. The ceiling hangs low overhead. Shadows gather in the
corners.

north.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

east.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

3338.name: A Cave Passageway
3338.description:
The tunnel weaves around, twisting to the north and west here. The
darkness around is near total. Ahead, you hear the sounds of
something metal banging against stone. Could someone be mining out the
tunnel, perhaps? The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. Dust
motes drift in the stale air.

north.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

west.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

3339.name: A Cave Passageway
3339.description:
A glimmer of light to the east alerts you to the fact that something is
going on in the tunnel nearby. The south exit of the tunnel leads off
into complete darkness. All around on the ground are piles of earth and
stone, making you have to wend through the tunnel carefully. Hmm. The
air is still and musty. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

east.description: A passage leads to The End Of The Passage

south.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

3340.name: The End Of The Passage
3340.description:
The tunnel stops abruptly here at a fissure in the stone. All around on
the ground are rocks and gravel, mined from the fissure in an attempt to
widen it enough for passage. A few pieces of paper litter and wrappers
tells you that the work here is relatively recent. Dust motes drift in
the stale air. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

west.description: A passage leads to A Cave Passageway

3341.name: A Rocky Slope
3341.description:
This treacherous slope leads ever-downward quite a ways, down to a
valley where there seems to be a small village! What a village is doing
this far from civilization, and how they survive you've no idea. From
the smoke wafting from some of the chimneys, it looks like this place is
still inhabited as well. Now if you can only get down this slope without
breaking an ankle... Bare rock dominates the landscape. Snow clings to
shadowed crevices.

east.description: A steep trail ascends to A Rocky Slope

west.description: A steep trail ascends to The Diverging Paths

3342.name: A Rocky Slope
3342.description:
You're slipping and sliding across this slope, trying to get to your
destination without breaking your leg or falling and shattering your
head. Below, you spot some movement in the village, giving proof the
place is not a ghost-town. The main road of the village starts at the
bottom of the slope just to the east, and the slope continues west and
up far, far up the mountain. The wind howls around exposed peaks. The
air is thin and cold at this altitude.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to Main Road

west.description: A steep trail ascends to A Rocky Slope

3343.name: Main Road
3343.description:
This place leaves you very unimpressed. And bored. The area is
definitely bored by this place. The people are listless, going about
their daily chores with a slowness that pains your eyes. A slope to the
west climbs up the mountainside, and two open shops made of wood and
stone are to your north and south. East-wards this road continues. There
is a small sign here. The sounds of city life echo around. The smell of
smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

north.description: A passage leads to The Mountain Tavern

east.description: The cobblestones lead to Main Road

south.description: A passage leads to The General Store

west.description: A steep trail ascends to A Rocky Slope

3344.name: The Mountain Tavern
3344.description:
Hmm. Looks like there's no one here, not even an bartender. Evidently
you've come during off hours, since no bar could be THIS dull. The walls
are decorated with mounted animal heads and arrows and longbows and
other hunting equipment/trophies. All of it looks rather plain. Shadows
gather in the corners. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Main Road

3345.name: The General Store
3345.description:
A bored shopkeeper waves an idle hand towards his stock of stuff.
Browse, type list, buy, sell, whatever... Shadows gather in the corners.
Dust motes drift in the stale air.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Main Road

3346.name: Main Road
3346.description:
Nothing is going on in this section of village either. To the east is an
actual road intersection, and to the west you see one of the ends of
this road. A large grassy area to the south is fenced off for a horse
corral. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air. Vendors and
pedestrians bustle past.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to The Intersection

south.description: A passage leads to The Corral

west.description: The cobblestones lead to Main Road

3347.name: The Corral
3347.description:
Many horses look up at you when you enter this corral. The horses are
kept in by a big wooden fence, which they seem quite happy to been kept
in by. You don't see anyone around taking care of these horses, but
someone is probably close by. The air is still and musty. The ceiling
hangs low overhead.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Main Road

3348.name: The Intersection
3348.description:
This is an intersection deep in the heart of Stanneg by the Mountains.
In fact, this is the ONLY intersection anywhere in Stanneg by the
Mountain it appears. There are some buildings to the north, and south,
and east, and west. None particularly stand out from the others.
Buildings crowd together on all sides. The sounds of city life echo
around.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to A Small Road

east.description: The cobblestones lead to Main Road

south.description: The cobblestones lead to A Small Road

west.description: The cobblestones lead to Main Road

3349.name: A Small Road
3349.description:
This road runs north through Stanneg by the Mountains, if through would
be the operative word for such a motley collection of buildings.
Westwards is a small, open-roofed building that appears to be a farmer's
market. The road you are on continues north, and comes to an
intersection just south of here. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs
in the air. The sounds of city life echo around.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to A Small Road

south.description: The cobblestones lead to The Intersection

west.description: The cobblestones lead to The Farmer's Market

3350.name: The Farmer's Market
3350.description:
One farmer's wife stands here, waiting for someone to buy the food her
family has grown. She looks bored, but not unhappy... no competition!
The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet. Buildings crowd
together on all sides.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to A Small Road

3351.name: A Small Road
3351.description:
The small, north-south road running through Stanneg by the Mountains
ends here, curving to become the front walk of a private home to the
east. The road runs south from this house, towards the center of the
village. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. The sounds of city life
echo around.

east.description: A normal, wooden front door to a normal looking home.  It is nothing to write home about.

south.description: The cobblestones lead to A Small Road

3352.name: A Private Home
3352.description:
The interior of this home is simple and rustic. A ladder leads up to the
loft, where the sleeping pallets are tucked away. A wood-burning stove
keeps the place well heated and cozy. A homemade rocking chair stands
crooked in the corner, draped with a old looking afghan. This home is a
nice place, very comfortable. The ceiling hangs low overhead. Dust motes
drift in the stale air.

west.description: There is a normal appearing door set in the western wall.

3353.name: A Small Road
3353.description:
The road ends here, leading up to a stone house to the south. Smoke
rises from the chimney in a dark stream, and the windows are frosted
over with humidity. North, you see the main intersection of Stanneg.
Buildings crowd together on all sides. The sounds of city life echo
around.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to The Intersection

south.description: A normal looking front door made of wood serves as the entrance.

3354.name: A Private Home
3354.description:
This home strikes you as unbearable warm and uncomfortable. The
fireplace is going at a full-bonfire, a mammoth stack of firewood beside
it against the wall. The decorations seem somewhat spartan and plain; a
landscape, an old hunting bow... nothing much of interest. Shadows
gather in the corners. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

north.description: You see a normal looking wooden door.

3355.name: Main Road
3355.description:
The main road through Stanneg ends here at a large well that leads deep,
deep into the earth. To the north of the well is a large building, with
a large WELCOME mat outside its front door. Westwards you see the a road
intersection in the center of the tiny village. around is a rocky
terrain in the middle of this mountain range...not very many places else
to go. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet. Buildings
crowd together on all sides.

north.description: There is a large set of double doors, made of wood blocking the way.

west.description: The cobblestones lead to The Intersection

3356.name: Stanneg Inn
3356.description:
This is a plainly decorated room, the main room of the Stanneg Inn. A
large arch to the west leads to a common room where food and drink can
be ordered, and a set of rickety wooden stairs lead up to the rooms are.
A thread- bare rug lies in the middle of the floor, evidently well-
loved by a cat or two from the quantity of hair on it. The ceiling hangs
low overhead. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

south.description: There is a large set of double doors, made of wood set into the wall.

west.description: A passage leads to The Common Room

up.description: A passage leads to The Reception

3357.name: The Common Room
3357.description:
A large fireplace warms this room in great waves of heat, to combat the
chill drafts eminating from the windows on the west and north sides of
this room. A few benches and tables are clustered in the center of the
room, for the use of the locals. Fairly plain, for a frequented
gathering place. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. Shadows
gather in the corners.

east.description: A passage leads to Stanneg Inn

3358.name: The Reception
3358.description:
A hall leads away to the west lined with small brown doors. A small
table has a ledger on it, seemingly almost unused. The hall is plain and
without any decoration, except for a nice painting of (what else) a
mountain hanging above the stairs that lead back down to the inn proper.
The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. Shadows gather in the
corners.

down.description: A passage leads to Stanneg Inn

3359.name: A Rocky Slope
3359.description:
This slope is fairly shallow and easy to walk on, despite the loose
shale and gravel. To the east is a high ridge you could stand on, and to
the west is a flat area near two trails leading up and down into the
mountains. High above, to the west, is that ominous, dark peak, which
seems to radiating a sense of hopelessness... Snow clings to shadowed
crevices. The path is steep and treacherous.

east.description: A steep trail ascends to The Diverging Paths

west.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Ledge

3360.name: A Ledge
3360.description:
This ledge overlooks a small path that leads up and down from here.
Below, you see the path head down to a large flat area where a small
cottage lies nestled in the mountains, smoke rising from it in a curling
line. Above, the path seems to head towards that dark peak piercing the
sky. You notice a few boot-tracks in the earth, seemingly to lead down
towards the cottage. Sheep trails wind between the hillocks. The terrain
rolls and dips around.

east.description: A steep trail ascends to A Rocky Slope

up.description: A steep trail ascends to A Mountain Trail

down.description: A rocky path climbs toward Outside Of A Cottage

3361.name: Outside Of A Cottage
3361.description:
Now that you approach closer to the cottage, you notice that the smoke
is not coming from the chimney, but rather the gutted ruins of the
building. Something torched this place, badly. You see no signs of life
among the wreckage. You can enter one of the particularly large holes in
the wall to the west, with caution. The wind carries the scent of wild
herbs. The view stretches for miles in every direction.

west.description: The cobblestones lead to The Torched Cottage

up.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Ledge

3362.name: The Torched Cottage
3362.description:
This whole place is smouldering still from whatever decided to try to
burn it to the ground. On the floor near the center of the ruined
structure is the burnt and dessicated corpse of a man, outstretched and
blackened. There's not much to see here; whatever decided to destroy
this place did it very well. Buildings crowd together on all sides. The
cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.

east.description: A rocky path climbs toward Outside Of A Cottage

3363.name: A Mountain Trail
3363.description:
This mountain trail leads straight up into the evil looking mountains.
High above, one mountain peak seems to radiate danger and fear, and
the trail seems to be leading straight up to it. You wonder if it is
wise to continue this way... The trail goes even higher up to the west,
and back down to the west. The wind howls around exposed peaks. Bare
rock dominates the landscape.

west.description: A steep trail ascends to A Mountain Trail

down.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Ledge

3364.name: A Mountain Trail
3364.description:
The trail leads up even higher into the mountains to the west here. You
shiver as the cold mountain air washes over you, and your back prickles
as you wonder if anything lives up here, or anything _dangerous_ for
that matter. Maybe heading back down to the east would be a good idea...
Bare rock dominates the landscape. The path is steep and treacherous.

east.description: A steep trail ascends to A Mountain Trail

west.description: A steep trail ascends to A Mountain Trail

3365.name: A Mountain Trail
3365.description:
The trail leads up the side of the tallest mountain in the range -- the
one that sticks up into the dark sky like a monument to death and
futility. The trail leads back to safety to the east, and goes even
higher to the west. The path is steep and treacherous. The air is thin
and cold at this altitude.

east.description: A steep trail ascends to A Mountain Trail

west.description: A steep trail ascends to Near The Peak

3366.name: Near The Peak
3366.description:
This is as close to the peak as you're going to get, unless you use that
tiny, tiny path leading up to the north. Up the side of the mountain you
see a great cave hollowed out, the inside pitch black. The path leads
down the mountains to the east, which seems to be the best place to go.
Bare rock dominates the landscape. The wind howls around exposed peaks.

north.description: A steep trail ascends to A Small, Dangerous Path

east.description: A steep trail ascends to A Mountain Trail

3367.name: A Small, Dangerous Path
3367.description:
This path leads up, up, up the side of the mountain, to the evil-seeming
cave. It also heads down to the south--a lot safer place to be. In fact,
you hear footsteps above your head... The air is thin and cold at this
altitude. Bare rock dominates the landscape.

south.description: A steep trail ascends to Near The Peak

up.description: A steep trail ascends to A Small, Dangerous Path

3368.name: A Small, Dangerous Path
3368.description:
Unfortunately, you realize too late that this bigger ledge that leads
north to the darkened cave is an ideal spot for an ambush. This ledge
gives you a beautiful panoramic view of the entire mountain range,
however. Breathtaking! Bare rock dominates the landscape. Snow clings to
shadowed crevices.

north.description: A rocky path climbs toward The Cave Entrance

down.description: A steep trail ascends to A Small, Dangerous Path

3369.name: The Cave Entrance
3369.description:
This is the entrance of a simply huge cave! The size is stunning! All
around the entrance are burnt bones and various types of wooden and
metal debris. Giant claw marks are all along the ground, leading back
deeper into the cave. Two tunnels lead off from here, one up, one down.
There are claw marks leading in either direction. The wind carries the
scent of wild herbs. Sheep trails wind between the hillocks.

south.description: A steep trail ascends to A Small, Dangerous Path

up.description: A passage leads to A Sloping Tunnel

down.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Sloping Tunnel

3370.name: A Sloping Tunnel
3370.description:
The tunnels slopes up to the north deeper into the mountain. A rather
gusty breeze riffles your clothing from ahead somewhere. The claw marks
in the stone floor continue up the passage, through the darkness.
Shadows gather in the corners. The air is still and musty.

north.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Sloping Tunnel

down.description: A rocky path climbs toward The Cave Entrance

3371.name: A Sloping Tunnel
3371.description:
The tunnel continues its slope upwards, and the wind blows at you even
stronger yet. The claw tracks in the stone stop abruptly here, where
there seems to be a lot of unearthed dirt and stone around, heaped upon
the floor. You feel uneasy about this place. Sheep trails wind between
the hillocks. Rocks jut from the grassy slopes.

north.description: A passage leads to The Pit

south.description: A passage leads to A Sloping Tunnel

3372.name: The Pit
3372.description:
You fall through the illusionary floor. You hit the poisoned spikes
below. You die very slowly of bloodloss, your head impaled at an awkward
angle. The air is still and musty. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

south.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Sloping Tunnel

3373.name: A Sloping Tunnel
3373.description:
This tunnel slopes deep, down into the mountain's heart. The air feels
still and uncomfortably warm, despite the closeness of the cave's
entrance above. There's a deep, musky odor in the air, and the giant
claw marks continue downwards. The terrain rolls and dips around.
The wind carries the scent of wild herbs.

up.description: A rocky path climbs toward The Cave Entrance

down.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Sloping Tunnel

3374.name: A Sloping Tunnel
3374.description:
A bright light greets your eyes from the north, in direct contrast to
the darkness of the tunnel overhead. You break out in a sweat due to the
overwhelming warmth of the air. The musky odor has grown quite intense,
drowning out everything else in the air and making it hard to breathe.
Something in your gut begins squirming uncomfortably as you wonder
what's ahead... The view stretches for miles in every direction. Sheep
trails wind between the hillocks.

north.description: A rocky path climbs toward The Lair

up.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Sloping Tunnel

3375.name: The Lair
3375.description:
This place is huge!!! It should be considering the dragon's great bulk.
However, instead of seeing the customary carnage and mound of gold that
one is accustomed to seeing in a dragon lair, this one is decorated
subtly with tapestries and drapes, and other comforts of human life.
There is even a huge-dragon sized bed -- undoubtedly conjured to life by
its elder dragon owner. The view stretches for miles in every direction.
The wind carries the scent of wild herbs.

south.description: A rocky path climbs toward A Sloping Tunnel

3300.name: farmer
3300.long_desc: A farmer walks around, looking for something to do.
3300.description:
This farmer is a resident of Stanneg by the Mountains,
and as such, is one of the most boring people on earth.

3301.name: storekeeper
3301.long_desc: A bored storekeeper waits for you to do something.
3301.description:
The bored storekeeper keeps a lazy eye on you as he
waits for you to buy something.  Whee.

3302.name: cowgirl
3302.long_desc: A cowgirl stand here ready to defend her horses...
3302.description:
This woman seems ready for anything you might do...
she is truly a woman to be reckoned with...

3303.name: horse
3303.long_desc: A horse does horsely things here.
3303.description:
This horse looks like a nice horse.  It looks at you
with soft brown eyes and you want to give it a carrot.

3304.name: farmer's
3304.long_desc: A farmer's wife offers you some vegetables.
3304.description:
This woman has many different types of fruits and
vegetables for you to buy.  She looks bored, though.

3305.name: aglandiir
3305.long_desc: The Dragon Prince, Aglandiir, sits here looking at you curiously.
3305.description:
Aglandiir is a prince of his kind, and he didn't get where 
he is today by letting people steal from his horde!

3306.name: cyclops
3306.long_desc: A Cyclops is here, trying to judge range with no depth perception.
3306.description:
This Cyclops throws rocks real good.  With one eye though, 
hitting the target is another matter.  He looks at you and 
growls as he misses again!

3307.name: salle
3307.long_desc: A woman ignores you completely, so intent is she upon her sword.
3307.description:
She is a stunning woman, all hair and eyes, it seems.
Her clothing is of the same tawny brown of her skin and
hair.  Her blue eyes look at you appraisingly, seemingly
to show great intelligence.  Her mouth twitches into a 
sneer...

3308.name: duwick
3308.long_desc: A truly immense man laughs at you, and draws his knife!
3308.description:
This has to be one of the biggest men you've ever seen.  He is
a full seven feet toe to head, and weighs a good three hundred
pounds -- mostly on his biceps and pectorals it appears.  An
ornate scabbard slaps by his side, with the pommel of a silvered
dagger sticking out... a tiny weapon for such a large man!

3309.name: receptionist
3309.long_desc: A receptionist offers you a room.
3309.description:
He looks like a retired farmer now making an honest living in an inn.
More power to him!

3310.name: innkeeper
3310.long_desc: An aged innkeeper greets you as you enter.
3310.description:
He is old and greying, but seems to have been able to
keep his mental faculties through the years.  A large
woolen sweater is wrapped about him for warmth.  His
blue eyes dance with amusement as he notices your weapons,
but he doesn't seem too terribly startled.

3311.name: hunter
3311.long_desc: A hunter walks through the town streets on his own time.
3311.description:
He looks mean, as if the very personality of the mountains
had infected him with hardness.  His stride is purposeful,
his face weathered, his eyes cold and dark.  Others are
standing out of his way as he walks on by.

3312.name: waiter
3312.long_desc: A waiter rushes by, intent on his business.
3312.description:
He looks harried from the way he hastily takes orders and 
rushes in the back to get food, and to the bar for drinks.  
He doesn't even spare you a glance as he passes by.

3313.name: waitress
3313.long_desc: A waitress rushes by, intent on her business.
3313.description:
She looks harried from the way she hastily takes orders and rushes
in the back to get food, and to the bar for drinks.  She doesn't
even spare you a glance as she passes by.

3314.name: bartender
3314.long_desc: A bartender washes a glass idly here.
3314.description:
He nods, smiles, and asks you what you would like to drink.
As you decide, he slowly polishes a glass with an old bar
rag.  The glass is completely clean, but he polishes it anyway.
Go figure.

3315.name: bandit
3315.long_desc: A bandit springs into action upon seeing you.
3315.description:
Whew!  Has this guy ever seen a bath?  His face, hands, arms...
nearly every bit of him is covered with grime, dust, dirt and
decay.  His sword is polished and cleaned though...

3316.name: bandit
3316.long_desc: A bandit guard stands at attention here.
3316.description:
He may be a bandit, but he's no slacker.  You wonder
who would be able to keep these bandits in line enough
to pull a good guard duty...

(boy is this guy DIRTY!!!)

3317.name: miner
3317.long_desc: A slave here is mining out a new passageway.
3317.description:
The slave looks up at you with pleading eyes.  He
wants his freedom.  The chains around his ankles are
tight, and you wonder if you should set him free, and
if you even can.

3318.name: farmer
3318.long_desc: A farmer walks around, looking for something to do.
3318.description:
This farmer is a resident of Stanneg by the Mountains,
and as such, is one of the most boring people on earth.

3319.name: hunter
3319.long_desc: A hunter walks through the town streets on his own time.
3319.description:
He looks mean, as if the very personality of the mountains
had infected him with hardness.  His stride is purposeful,
his face weathered, his eyes cold and dark.  Others are
standing out of his way as he walks on by.

3300.name: orange
3300.room_desc: An orange lies on the ground here.

3301.name: bale
3301.room_desc: There is a bale of wheat here.

3302.name: zither
3302.room_desc: A HUGE zither made of gold rests in the corner

3303.name: barrel
3303.room_desc: You can smell a barrel on the other side of the room from here.

3304.name: statue
3304.room_desc: There is a statue of Aglandiir here, made of solid gold.

3305.name: halberd
3305.room_desc: A runed halberd lies on the ground here.

3306.name: potion
3306.room_desc: A vial of a dun fluid is here.

3307.name: crown
3307.room_desc: Aglandiir's crown sits here, radiating a shield.

3308.name: apple
3308.room_desc: A scrawny red apple sits here.

3309.name: bread
3309.room_desc: A fresh loaf of bread lies here.

3310.name: melon
3310.room_desc: A melon sits here, discarded evidently.

3311.name: knife
3311.room_desc: An exquisitely crafted knife rests here.

3312.name: sword
3312.room_desc: A superb long sword sticks in the earth.

3313.name: sword
3313.room_desc: A short sword lies here... a work of art!

3314.name: corpse
3314.room_desc: A dismembered and burnt corpse lies on the ground here.

3315.name: scimitar
3315.room_desc: A scimitar as long as your arm lies here.

3317.name: bow
3317.room_desc: A hunting bow lies here, unwanted

3318.name: vest
3318.room_desc: A nice leather vest lies here.

3319.name: glass
3319.room_desc: A glass of beer sits forgotten here.

3320.name: glass
3320.room_desc: A big glass of mead sits here, cool and frosty.

3321.name: shot
3321.room_desc: A shot of whisky is sitting here.
